credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Section of the Wings and Elevation of a Wall on the Court, Palazzo Farnese, Rome
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray and red wash, over black chalk on paper, lined
description: Section of a large, three-story building.  Section through the middle line of the court, the vestibule being at the left.  The elevation of the southeastern side of the court and section of the main and the rear wings are shown.  Measurements are inscribed.
name: Drawing
